oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate veteran William Thompson and Rhoda Ann Thurman
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postwar photograph of William "Bill" Thompson and Rhoda Ann "Rhodie" Thurman Thompson. William Thompson was a private in Co. C, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt. (Gore's), CSA. Private Thompson mustered in at Cookeville on October 12, 1862.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Thompson, William; Thompson, Rhoda Ann Thurman
